name: Langchain
description:
Owners: Anudeep Dhonde

Contributors:Spring Wu, Uros Pajic

LangChain is an open-source framework designed to facilitate the development of applications powered by large language models (LLMs). It provides a standardized interface and tools that simplify the process of connecting LLMs to various data sources, external tools, and other APIs. Essentially, LangChain acts as a bridge, enabling developers to build more versatile and powerful AI applications by combining the capabilities of LLMs with external information and functionality.

Projects: MS PURVIEW INVESTIGATION AGENT

Additional links: Langchain

name: Knowledge Graph
description:
Owners: Uros Pajic, Rahul Jha

Contributors: Spring Wu, Anudeep Dhonde,

A knowledge graph is a structured way to represent knowledge as a network of interconnected entities, concepts, and their relationships. Think of it as a database that not only stores information about things but also describes how those things are related to each other, forming a complex web of knowledge.

Projects: MS PURVIEW INVESTIGATION AGENT

Additional links: Knowledge Graph
